name: css-letter-spacing
description: Css module of single purpose classes for letter spacing

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-letter-spacing.css > css/css-letter-spacing.css && tachyons src/css-letter-spacing.css --minify > css/css-letter-spacing.min.css && tachyons src/css-letter-spacing.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
